Description: Microsoft Teams, the hub for team collaboration in Microsoft 365, integrates the people, content, and tools your team needs to be more engaged and effective.
Name: Microsoft Teams

Methods.Name: Get Call
Methods.Description: Get all details of a call.

Methods.Name: List User Chats
Methods.Description: List all chats for the specified user.

Methods.Name: List New and Updated User Chats
Methods.Description: List chats for the specified user that have been created or updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: List New User Chats
Methods.Description: List chats for the specified user that have been created since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Channel Members
Methods.Description: List all members of a channel.

Methods.Name: Get Channel
Methods.Description: Get all details of a channel.

Methods.Name: List Team Channels
Methods.Description: List all channels of a team.

Methods.Name: List Group Members
Methods.Description: List all members in a group.

Methods.Name: List Groups
Methods.Description: List all groups.

Methods.Name: Get User Chat Message
Methods.Description: Get a message of a user chat.

Methods.Name: Get Channel Message
Methods.Description: Get a message of a channel.

Methods.Name: List Updated Channel Messages
Methods.Description: List all new or updated messages of a channel since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Channel Messages
Methods.Description: List all messages of a channel.

Methods.Name: List Joined Teams
Methods.Description: List all joined teams.

Methods.Name: List User Group Memberships
Methods.Description: Lists groups that the user is a direct member of.

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: List all users.

Methods.Name: Get User
Methods.Description: Get a user.

Methods.Name: Get Users Chats
Methods.Description: Get users chats once they are sent.

Methods.Name: Get Completed Call
Methods.Description: Retrieve calls once they have concluded.

Methods.Name: Get Team Chats
Methods.Description: Get team chats once they are sent.
